title: PTD Today — Media

items.title: Transforming Healthcare Document Processing Workflows with Generative AI

ai.summary: Based on the available description, this technical session demonstrates AWS's GenAI Intelligent Document Processing (GenAIIDP) using Amazon Textract and Bedrock to automate complex medical document workflows and reduce days-long manual processing into minutes. The session includes live demos and architecture deep-dives covering automated classification, data extraction, criteria validation, HIPAA compliance, scalable pipelines, integration patterns, and ROI best practices.
bullets: Showcases GenAIIDP combining Amazon Textract and Bedrock for healthcare document automation
Automated classification, data extraction, and criteria validation for complex medical docs
Transforms manual, days-long processes into minute-scale automated workflows
Maintains HIPAA compliance while addressing regulatory requirements
Includes live demonstrations, architecture deep-dives, integration patterns, and ROI best practices
takeaways: Processing time reduction (days to minutes) directly addresses document processing bottlenecks
Scalable document-processing pipelines enable deployments that can grow with demand
Integration patterns support incorporating GenAIIDP into existing systems and workflows
Built-in HIPAA compliance and validation features help maintain regulatory requirements
ROI-focused best practices aim to maximize efficiency and justify automation investments

items.title: TTEC accelerates AI deployment and revenue streams with Google Cloud Consulting

ai.summary: Based on the available description… TTEC partnered with Google Cloud Consulting to rapidly prototype and deploy AI solutions, using GenAI and Google Cloud infrastructure to streamline operations and boost developer productivity. The engagement compressed TTEC's digital transformation timeline and unlocked entirely new revenue streams.
bullets: TTEC worked with Google Cloud Consulting to accelerate AI solution prototyping and deployment.
GenAI plus Google Cloud's infrastructure were used to streamline operations.
Developer productivity was improved through the platform and consulting engagement.
The project compressed TTEC's digital transformation timeline.
New revenue streams were unlocked as a result of the AI deployments.
takeaways: Robust cloud infrastructure can enable faster AI deployment and operational improvements.
Engaging cloud consulting services can compress transformation timelines and hasten value realization.
GenAI initiatives have the potential to create new revenue streams when paired with the right platform.
Improvements in developer productivity are a tangible benefit of platform and consulting support.

items.title: Year-end toolkit: Strengthening audit committee collaboration

ai.summary: Based on the available description… This episode focuses on strengthening collaboration between finance/management and the audit committee during the year-end accounting and reporting process. It highlights communication and reporting best practices and addresses emerging oversight areas including AI, enterprise risk management, cyber risk, and proxy disclosures.
bullets: Guidance on improving management and audit committee communication and collaboration at year-end.
Overview of key year-end accounting and reporting issues finance teams should be ready to address.
Discussion of audit committee oversight of AI: risks, opportunities, and necessary controls.
Advice for enhancing enterprise risk oversight and navigating evolving cyber risk in the age of AI.
Considerations for elevating proxy disclosures and governance communications.
takeaways: Ensure audit committee briefings explicitly cover AI-related controls and how AI use affects financial reporting and internal controls.
Prepare targeted year-end materials that link operational initiatives (e.g., transformations) to accounting impacts and disclosures.
Frame enterprise risk discussions to show how operational and cyber risks can translate into financial and disclosure risks.
Document and communicate cyber risk management and control effectiveness to support audit committee oversight.
Review proxy disclosures to reflect governance approaches and oversight of emerging risks like AI and large-scale transformation efforts.

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

ai.summary: Based on the available description, the video shows Jo discovering how Copilot Groups makes route planning easy. It highlights Copilot Groups as a capability of Microsoft Copilot and is tagged with copilot, microsoftcopilot, and ai.
bullets: Description: "Route planning made easy—Jo discovers the power of Copilot Groups."
Feature focus: Copilot Groups for route planning
Presented through a user (Jo) discovering the feature
Includes hashtags: #copilot #microsoftcopilot #ai
takeaways: The description emphasizes simplified route planning via Copilot Groups—decision-makers should note AI features that address routing and logistics needs.
If crew routing, maintenance visits, or service dispatch are part of operations, evaluate whether Copilot Groups can streamline those workflows.
Quick, example-led presentations can help assess usability and fit faster—consider viewing the video to judge applicability for your environment.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… AI w audycie to już codzienność; w podcaście ekspertki KPMG omawiają praktyczne zastosowania narzędzi AI (m.in. AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI, KPMG Clara) do analizy pełnych populacji danych, wsparcia dokumentacji, komunikacji z klientem i zarządzania badaniem w czasie rzeczywistym. Rozmowa porusza też zmiany roli audytora, wyzwania wdrożeniowe, kwestie bezpieczeństwa danych, wymogi regulacyjne oraz potencjalne zagrożenia.
bullets: AI automatyzuje powtarzalne czynności i pozwala analizować pełne populacje transakcji (AI Transaction Scoring Tool).
Clara AI działa jako konwersacyjny asystent oraz zestaw wyspecjalizowanych agentów wspierających audyt.
Narzędzia AI wspomagają dokumentację i analizę ujawnień, poprawiając dokładność i spójność prac audytowych.
Platforma KPMG Clara umożliwia zarządzanie badaniem w czasie rzeczywistym, a Clara for Clients usprawnia komunikację z klientem.
W dyskusji podkreślono wyzwania: adaptacja audytorów, bezpieczeństwo danych, środowisko regulacyjne i możliwe zagrożenia związane z AI.
takeaways: Lepsza analiza pełnych populacji redukuje ryzyko nieprzewidzianych błędów — warto zapewnić spójne i kompletne źródła danych w infrastrukturze.
Integracja narzędzi AI z procesami operacyjnymi umożliwia szybszy audyt i bieżący nadzór — rozważ kompatybilność platform z systemami centrum danych.
Bezpieczeństwo danych i zgodność regulacyjna są kluczowe przy wdrażaniu rozwiązań AI — priorytetem powinny być polityki dostępu, szyfrowanie i audyt ścieżek danych.
Automatyzacja zmienia rolę audytora: inwestycja w kompetencje personelu (analiza danych, obsługa narzędzi AI) zwiększy wartość audytu.
Wdrożenie AI przynosi korzyści, ale wymaga zarządzania ryzykiem i monitorowania potencjalnych zagrożeń technologicznych.
